actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: A bill to provide that the terms of pension, retirement, and similar insurance plans which call for different retirement ages for men and women shall be unlawful.

summary.text: Provides that the terms of pension, retirement, and similar insurance plans which call for different retirement ages for men and women shall be unlawful.

titles.title: A bill to provide that the terms of pension, retirement, and similar insurance plans which call for different retirement ages for men and women shall be unlawful.
